com.stabilit.sc.srv.server
Class Server

java.lang.Object
  com.stabilit.sc.srv.server.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.stabilit.sc.factory.IFactoryable, com.stabilit.sc.srv.server.IServer
public abstract class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.stabilit.sc.srv.server.IServer

The Class Server. Abstracts server functionality from a application view. It is not the technical representation of a server connection.

Author:
JTraber
